classification.modes:
[mode for mode in combineModeDimensions( INHERITED_MODES, [
{"subtest":"subtest1", "iterations":"100", "maxHours":"-10"}, {"subtest":"subtest2", "iterations": 1000, "maxHours":-10}, {"subtest":"subtest2", "iterations": 1000, "maxHours":-10} ])
if not (mode['mode'].startswith('MySQL_Firefox_rootmode1_SoakTest_maxHours=5_fast=') and mode['mode'] == 'MySQL_Firefox_rootmode1_SoakTest_maxHours=5_fast=_Subtest1_iterations=100_maxHours=-10' and mode['browser']=='Firefox' and project.myProjectProp=='myValue' and IS_WINDOWS in [True,False]) ]
